articles.title: Biden Criticizes Trump's Birthright Citizenship Plans
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden condemned President-elect Donald Trump's plan to end birthright citizenship in the United States. articles.title: Zelenskiy Seeks Trump's Security Assurance for Ukraine
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy stresses the need for U.S. security guarantees to end Russia's war in Ukraine. Zelenskiy eyes collaboration with U.S. President-elect Donald Trump to forge a 'peace through strength' strategy.

Youth increasingly prefer non-alcoholic options, potentially aligning with Surgeon General warnings.
